name: Sumedha
techstacks: ReactJS, JavaScript, JWT, Parcel, Context API, React Router V6
description: Finalist project under Smart India Hackathon 2022.
Developed a progressive web app (PWA) using React, designed to aid parents in tracking and supporting the holistic growth of their children.
Handled API integration alongside handling authentication using JSON Web Token, React Router V6 and Context API.

Implemented two separate platforms within the app: one for parents and another for children, allowing parents to create accounts for their children and assign tasks based on their developmental level.

Child's platform features brain quizzes, AI-guided yoga. Parent's platform enables parents to track their child's progress including overall percentiles, graphical representations of completed tasks, booking appointments with pediatricians, growth milestones, etc.

name: FullHouse
techstacks: ReactJS, Youtube Data Api, Styled Components, NodeJS, MongoDB, ExpressJS, Mongoose, Socket.io, JWT
description: Developed a dynamic app that enables users to create and join rooms for synchronous YouTube video watching and real-time chatting.
Implemented secure user authentication using JSON Web Token (JWT), ensuring a personalized and secure experience for each user.
Leveraged Socket.io to synchronize YouTube video playback across multiple users, creating a shared viewing experience within the app.
Integrated Socket.io to enable real-time chat functionality, allowing users in the same room to interact and communicate while watching videos together.
Utilized MongoDB, Mongoose, and Node.js to efficiently store and retrieve user data, ensuring seamless data management within the app.

name: PomoTimer
techstacks: ReactJS, Youtube Data Api V3, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI
description: Developed an application focusing on productivity and physical health using React.
Created a simple and configurable Pomodoro timer to provide a reliable way to track productivity using the Pomodoro Technique.
Used Youtube API to provide customised exercise videos at the end of each work cycle.
Implemented frontend catching to reduce API calls and smoothen the user experience.
Created intuitive and visually-pleasing UI using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.

name: Finance Buddy
techstacks: ReactJS, JSON Web Token, CSS, HTML
description: Developed a web-based financial literacy tool for the younger generation.
Made use of a gamified approach with a lesson-based curriculum and scored quizzes on the various financial domains.
Created a parents dashboard where they can connect with their children, keep a real-time track of their kids progress and curate quizzes and lessons for them.
Worked on - Developing the front-end of the application, API integration, and authentication using JSON Web Token

name: JavaScript Projects
description: It is an open-source collection of over 23 JavaScript projects.
These projects are developed keeping in mind the latest ES6 Javascript features and conventions. The difficulty of the projects varies from easy to medium.
